column2: **Occupation** (What the hell is that?): Starting Weapon, Something extra
**Assassin**: Knife in sleeve sheathe, Poison, 1 dose
**Besom maker** (Broom maker): Broom (staff), Corn stalks, 1 bundle
**Bodger** (Guy who makes chair legs in the forest): Knife, Shaving horse
**Colporteur** (Seller of (mainly religious) books): Letter opener, Religious tome
**Courtesan**: Stiletto in boot sheath, Make up kit
**Dyer**: Stirring paddle (club), 3 small jars of dye
**Farrier** (Guy who puts shoes on horses.): Hoof nippers (club), Horseshoe, iron
**Fence** (Middleman buyer of shifty merchandise): Light crossbow, 10sp sewn into jacket hem
**Food critic**: Steak knife, Fortified wine, one bottle
**Gong farmer** (Remover of shit from outhouses): Trowel (dagger), Night soil, 1 bag
**Grave robber**: Shovel, Small yet valuable totem (5sp)
**Icecutter**: Ice saw, 50 pound block of ice
**Lighterman** (Ferries goods from ship to shore): 10'Â pole, Shallow-bottomed boat
**Nobleman's son**: Longsword, silver ring worth 20 sp
**Organ thief**: Scalpel (dagger), Spare kidney on ice in sack
**Oyster raker**: Rake, Crushed oyster shells, 1 bag
**Rat catcher**: Long net (staff), Small but vicious dog
**Spy**: Dagger in sleeve sheath, Specialist's tools
